mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id AS cartId, c.memID AS memID, p.PRODUCTID As PRODUCTID, m.memName AS memName, p.product_name AS productName, c.amount, p.product_price AS productPrice, (product_price * amount) money FROM tbl_member m, PRODUCT p, cart c WHERE m.memID = c.memID AND p.PRODUCTID = c.PRODUCTID AND c.memID = #{memID} ORDER BY c.cart_id
